BodyName: Committee on Women and Gender Equity
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Health

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Health
Oversight - Current State of Access to Healthcare for LGBTQIA+ Individuals.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Current State of Access to Healthcare for LGBTQIA+ Individuals.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to signage regarding transgender rights and services at hospitals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Signage regarding transgender rights and services at hospitals.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass, and the President to sign, the COVID-19 Long Haulers Act
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.2475, to protect access to gender-affirming care in New York State and combat policies of other states that attempt to ban gender-affirming care.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Protect access to gender-affirming care in New York State and combat policies of other states that attempt to ban gender-affirming care. (S. 2475)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation to protect New York State’s safety net providers and Special Needs Plans by eliminating the Medicaid pharmacy carve-out.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Protect New York State’s safety net providers and Special Needs Plans by eliminating the Medicaid pharmacy carve-out.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the use of city resources to enforce restrictions on gender-affirming care
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the use of city resources to enforce restrictions on gender-affirming care.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Schulman, Hudson, Feliz, Menin, Narcisse, Velasquez, Ariola and Public Advocate Williams.
